results.title: Nine to Five
results.brief_description: 9 to 5 is an office satire about three female secretaries who decide to get revenge on their tyrannical, sexist boss by abducting him and running the business themselves. Features star turns by Jane Fonda, Lily Tomlin and Dolly Parton.

constellations_other.name: Technology and work
constellations_other.description: How does the godfather of animation and sprocket technology connect to Jane Fonda workout videos and a Jesus biopic?

results.description: Frank Hart is a pig. He takes advantage in the grossest manner of the women who work with him. When his three assistants manage to trap him in his own house they assume control of his department and productivity leaps, but just how long can they keep Hart tied up?
description_for_label: Frank Hart is a pig. He takes advantage in the grossest manner of the women who work with him. When his three assistants manage to trap him in his own house they assume control of his department and productivity leaps, but just how long can they keep Hart tied up?

results.title: Newsfront
results.brief_description: Surprisingly adventurous saga of an intrepid group of cinematographers and reporters who risk life and limb to capture footage of breaking news for the movie-going public.

constellations_other.name: Newsreel to nightly news
constellations_other.description: For decades, newsreel companies covered the news, providing weekly stories of current events, sport, and entertainment to audiences at the cinema, and establishing the format that would be taken up by television and the nightly news.

results.description: Surprisingly adventurous saga of an intrepid group of cinematographers and reporters who risk life and limb to capture footage of breaking news for the movie-going public.
description_for_label: Surprisingly adventurous saga of an intrepid group of cinematographers and reporters who risk life and limb to capture footage of breaking news for the movie-going public.

results.title: Network
results.creator_credit: United Artists, Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer, Sidney Lumet, Theoni V. Aldredge, Fred C. Caruso, Philip Rosenberg, Paddy Chayefsky and Howard Gottfried
results.brief_description: When veteran anchorman Howard Beale is forced to retire his 25-year post because of his age, he announces to viewers that he will kill himself during his farewell broadcast. Network executives rethink their decision when his fanatical tirade results in a spike in ratings.

constellations_other.name: Newsreel to nightly news
constellations_other.description: For decades, newsreel companies covered the news, providing weekly stories of current events, sport, and entertainment to audiences at the cinema, and establishing the format that would be taken up by television and the nightly news.

results.creator_credit_for_label: United Artists, Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer, Sidney Lumet, Theoni V. Aldredge, Fred C. Caruso, Philip Rosenberg, Paddy Chayefsky and Howard Gottfried
results.description: When veteran anchorman Howard Beale is forced to retire his 25-year post because of his age, he announces to viewers that he will kill himself during his farewell broadcast. Network executives rethink their decision when his fanatical tirade results in a spike in ratings.

results.title: Neighbours
results.creator_credit: FremantleMedia Australia and Reg Grundy Productions Pty. Ltd.
results.brief_description: Everybody needs good neighbours and for over 35 years the residents of Ramsay Street have shared their lives, loves and laugher with us. Featuring tragic love stories, long-lost family members and mysterious resurrections, Neighbours has been part of the family for a generation.

constellations_other.name: Australian TV in the 1980s
constellations_other.description: Australian television in the 80s really began to find its footing with mainstream hits becoming landmarks of the industry.

results.creator_credit_for_label: FremantleMedia Australia and Reg Grundy Productions Pty. Ltd.
results.description: Neighbours is an Australian television soap opera. The show’s storylines concern the domestic and professional lives of the people who live and work in Erinsborough, a fictional suburb of Melbourne, Victoria. The series primarily centres around the residents of Ramsay Street, a short cul-de-sac, and its neighbouring areas, the Lassiters complex, which includes a bar, hotel, cafe, news office and park. Neighbours began with three families created by Watson – the Ramsays, the Robinsons and the Clarkes. Watson said that he wanted to show three families who are friends living in a small street. The Robinsons and the Ramsays had a long history and were involved in an ongoing rivalry.
description_for_label: Neighbours is an Australian television soap opera. The show’s storylines concern the domestic and professional lives of the people who live and work in Erinsborough, a fictional suburb of Melbourne, Victoria. The series primarily centres around the residents of Ramsay Street, a short cul-de-sac, and its neighbouring areas, the Lassiters complex, which includes a bar, hotel, cafe, news office and park. Neighbours began with three families created by Watson – the Ramsays, the Robinsons and the Clarkes. Watson said that he wanted to show three families who are friends living in a small street. The Robinsons and the Ramsays had a long history and were involved in an ongoing rivalry.

results.title: Ned Kelly
results.brief_description: Unable to support his family in the Australian outback, a man turns to stealing horses in order to make money. He gets more deeply drawn into the outlaw life, and eventually becomes involved in murders. Based on the life of famed 19th-century Australian outlaw Ned Kelly.

constellations_other.name: Crime doesn't pay
constellations_other.description: Ned Kelly's famous armour has appeared in many films, but the criminal myth speaks to how audiences have always been captivated by true-crime stories, from the beginning of cinema to today.

results.description: Unable to support his family in the Australian outback, a man turns to stealing horses in order to make money. He gets more deeply drawn into the outlaw life, and eventually becomes involved in murders. Based on the life of famed 19th-century Australian outlaw Ned Kelly.

results.title: Near Dark
results.creator_credit: DEG, F/M, Near Dark Joint Venture, Eric Red, Kathryn Bigelow, Stephen Altman, Joseph A. Porro and Steven-Charles Jaffe
results.brief_description: A farm boy reluctantly becomes a member of the undead when a girl he meets turns out to be part of a band of vampires who roam the highways in stolen cars.

constellations_other.name: Go Bang
constellations_other.description: Australian dance act PNAU are renowned for groundbreaking visuals in their music videos, including for their 2017 single 'Go Bang' which featured Kira Divine.

results.creator_credit_for_label: DEG, F/M, Near Dark Joint Venture, Eric Red, Kathryn Bigelow, Stephen Altman, Joseph A. Porro and Steven-Charles Jaffe
results.description: A farm boy reluctantly becomes a member of the undead when a girl he meets turns out to be part of a band of vampires who roam the highways in stolen cars.

results.title: Nanook of the North
results.creator_credit: Révillon Frères and Robert J. Flaherty
results.headline_credit: France and United States of America, 1922
results.brief_description: This pioneering documentary film depicts the lives of the indigenous Inuit people of Canada’s northern Quebec region. Although the production contains some fictional elements, it vividly shows how its resourceful subjects survive in such a harsh climate.
results.description: This pioneering documentary film depicts the lives of the indigenous Inuit people of Canada’s northern Quebec region. Although the production contains some fictional elements, it vividly shows how its resourceful subjects survive in such a harsh climate, revealing how they construct their igloo homes and find food by hunting and fishing. The film also captures the beautiful, if unforgiving, frozen landscape of the Great White North, far removed from conventional civilization.
description_for_label: This pioneering documentary film depicts the lives of the indigenous Inuit people of Canada’s northern Quebec region. Although the production contains some fictional elements, it vividly shows how its resourceful subjects survive in such a harsh climate, revealing how they construct their igloo homes and find food by hunting and fishing. The film also captures the beautiful, if unforgiving, frozen landscape of the Great White North, far removed from conventional civilization.

results.title: Mystery of the Wax Museum
results.brief_description: Years after sculptor Ivan Igor’s partner burns down his wax museum and his “children”, Igor stars a new museum in New York, but his maimed hands confine him to direct lesser artists. People begin disappearing and Igor takes a sinister interested in his assistant’s fiancé.

constellations_other.name: Movies on wax
constellations_other.description: Waxing lyrical about the supernatural and early 21st-century teen stars.

results.description: The disappearance of people and corpses leads a reporter to a wax museum and a sinister sculptor.
description_for_label: The disappearance of people and corpses leads a reporter to a wax museum and a sinister sculptor.

results.title: My Neighbor Totoro
results.brief_description: Two sisters move to the country with their father in order to be closer to their hospitalised mother and discover the surrounding trees are inhabited by Totoros, magical spirits of the forest in this beloved Studio Ghibli classic.

constellations_other.name: Optical toys, Totoro and terrors
constellations_other.description: Victorian-era optical toys have inspired the biggest animation studios and the scariest horror films.

constellations_other.name: Storytime animated
constellations_other.description: Abra Cadabra was the world's first stereoscopic 3D film, but animators and filmmakers had experimented with the technology far earlier and continue to use other older techniques like stop-motion animation.

results.description: Two sisters move to the country with their father in order to be closer to their hospitalised mother and discover the surrounding trees are inhabited by Totoros, magical spirits of the forest. When the youngest runs away from home, the older sister seeks help from the spirits to find her.
description_for_label: Two sisters move to the country with their father in order to be closer to their hospitalised mother and discover the surrounding trees are inhabited by Totoros, magical spirits of the forest. When the youngest runs away from home, the older sister seeks help from the spirits to find her.

results.title: My Fair Lady
results.brief_description: A snobbish phonetics professor agrees to a wager that he can take a flower girl and make her presentable in high society.

constellations_other.name: Sound and cinema
constellations_other.description: Beginning with one of the first films to be screened at the Palais (a Melbourne cinema with its own outstanding resident orchestra) the constellation celebrates sound as an integral part of the connection between moving image work and audience.

results.description: A snobbish phonetics professor agrees to a wager that he can take a flower girl and make her presentable in high society.
